Interested in taking a lead role with an EHR/PM technology vendor to advance healthcare interoperability via the HL7 FHIR standard? Allscripts is currently seeing a Solution Manager to expand our FHIR development capabilities, determine our roadmap, participate in FHIR accelerators and educate our clients on opportunities to connect FHIR apps and participate in real world testing of new resources and workflows. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who has been engaged in the FHIR community and would like to advance their career with an established vendor with the potential to impact thousands of clients and millions of patients. To learn more and apply, go to the Allscripts Careers page at: United States Job Applications | Careers at Allscripts<https://careers.allscripts.com/jobs-us/?gh_jid=4779685003>

@Tina Joros
